articles.description: Future Group has filed a SLP before the Supreme Court against the Delhi High Court verdict passed against it in March this year.
articles.content:
But the chances of a SLP being maintainable are very, very low, he added.
Last week, while upholding the validity of an emergency arbitrator, the apex court had interpreted several provisions of the… [+561 chars]

articles.author: ET Now Digital
articles.title: ITC concerned over share price underperformance despite good earnings, dividend payout: Sanjiv Puri - Times Now
articles.description: Puri highlighted that the company’s earnings per share increased 47% between 2016-17 and 2019-20, while margins of the non-cigarette FMCG business have improved 640 basis points in the past four years.
articles.content:
• Over the last one year, ITC shares have gained only 3%, underperforming the sector benchmark Nifty FMCG
